coreAttributes.name: Swamp Water
coreAttributes.description: A sturdy glass bottle filled with what appears to be some kind of moonshine. A label on the front shows a greater alligator-boy receiving oral from an alligator-girl while drinking from a bottle just like this one.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.75)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Pulling out the stopper from the bottle of Swamp Water, [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] a large swig of the extremely-alcoholic moonshine. The intense, musky taste proves to be extremely delicious, and [npc.name] can't help but greedily gulp down the entire bottle, leaving a strange, tangy aftertaste lingering on [npc.her] [npc.tongue+].
useDescriptions.otherUse: Pulling out the stopper from the bottle of Swamp Water, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the extremely-alcoholic moonshine up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips] and [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.herHim] to drink it. The intense, musky taste proves to be extremely delicious, and [npc2.name] can't help but greedily gulp down the entire bottle, leaving a strange, tangy aftertaste lingering on [npc2.her] [npc2.tongue+].
